features.copy:
While most test frameworks make it easy to test your code, Crank makes it easy to test where code you own interfaces with code you don't.

Crank is your no-code test suite for integrated enterprise SaaS technology.
features.title: No-Code SaaS QA

features.copy: If you're running tests that touch business technology, you're probably collaborating with business users. Crank uses an easy-to-read test scenario format that developers and business users alike can understand.
features.title: Meaningful BDD

features.copy: Crank is just the test runner. It runs actions and assertions that come packaged in Docker containers we call Cogs. Can't find the Cog for a system in your environment? Build and contribute your Cog back!
features.title: Open Ecosystem
